entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deal with the scenario of a handler on a virtual view being set to a new handler. #8456
    6.0-servicing
  • App crashes on startup in android when Code shrinker is set to r8 #8454
  • Border with shadows not working on iOS and Mac but works on Android and Windows #8452
  • ScrollView does not handle rotation well #8447
    6.0-sr3
  • Buttons (or clicking) don't seem to work properly in scrollviews #8446
    6.0-sr3
  • [Android] IsVisible property change won't work as expected via MVVM #8445
  • App does not deployed to local as well as remote iPhone #8444
  • navigation bar is displayed(the gray line) #8443
  • Sample Maui App fails to install on browserstack #8440
  • Application Style gets applied even though separate style provided #8439
  • Basic UI is wrong on Windows #8438
  • Android Picker (Theme Change BackgroundColor wont Update) Bug #8437
  • CarouselView scrolling slow if it contains CollectionView in Android app #8436
  • CollectionView is not updating SelectedItems bound property #8435

Closed

  • Application.Current.MainPage is null on application launch in windows #8403
  • docker run --publish 7080:7080 --publish 127.0.0.1:3370:3370 --rm --volume ~/.sourcegraph/config:/etc/sourcegraph --volume ~/.sourcegraph/data:/var/opt/sourcegraph sourcegraph/server:3.41.0 #8449
  • [Bug]iOS,Android: Grid not measured size by it's content #3832
    6.0-servicing
  • VisualElement.InvalidateMeasure not work at Android after update VisualStudio to 17.3.0 preview2 #8270
  • An empty Row in Grid takes up no space #8448
  • iOS Layouts not resizing #7507
    6.0-sr3
  • UI rendering not working as expected on Android #8405
  • IImage.Resize on Android always returns an object with **System.ObjectDisposedException:** 'Cannot access a disposed object. #6909
    6.0-servicing
  • Shell Margin Exception #8160
  • Properties Height and Width have values equal -1 after Initialization of page components #8176
  • No parameterless constructor defined for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.FrameRenderer #8197

PullRequests

Created

  • Call disconnect on previous handler with Shell #8455
  • Ensure the iOS ScrollView content container is at least the ScrollView size #8451
  • Set the link mode to None when using interpreter #8450
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22326.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 #8442
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump GitInfo from 2.1.2 to 2.2.0 #8441
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Remove the confusing `.` in the template tests #8392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Add a root view for a window to manage pages and overlays #8428
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, area/tooling ⚙️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.4.1.1 to 1.4.2.1 #7856
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.1.2 #7850
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2.1 #7890
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1.1 #7858
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [NET7.0] [Tizen] Bump up Samsung Tizen Sdk version #8434
  • Update with branch information #8420
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Editor on iOS so it can GC #8430

Updated

  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7
  • Use the WASDK self-contained by default #8432
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7926
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix crash using animations and changing View sizes (negative values) #8273
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, fatal
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 118.0.2.1 #7891
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 119.1.0 to 120.0.0.8 #7892
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.2 to 2.4.2.1 #7851
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.1 to 1.4.0.2 #7848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • [android] fix MauiSplashScreen on Android 12+ #8394
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.4.2 to 2.4.2.1 #7857
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 from 1.0.0.13 to 1.0.0.14 #7854
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.4.2 to 2.4.2.1 #7853
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.4.2 to 2.4.2.1 #7855
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix wrong RadialGradient on Border #8408
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr3
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SelfContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0-sr3
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • Handle null/empty PropertyName in the INPC.PropertyChanged event #8418
    area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.6 to 1.2.1.7 #7852
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
